row.name: UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDE#
row.xui:

row.name: UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDE#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Server filter exclude" tooltip="Defines which files should be excluded from the application snapshot. If empty, no files are excluded. You may use regular expressions. It is recommended for example to exclude the temp/, logs/ and work/ directories of your Tomcat server since they change continously. Excluding the webapps directory is also recommended, since it is already covered in the snapshot of the application." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="text">Server filter exclude</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDEs.00</entry> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Defines which files should be excluded from the application snapshot. If empty, no files are excluded. You may use regular expressions. It is recommended for example to exclude the temp/, logs/ and work/ directories of your Tomcat server since they change continously. Excluding the webapps directory is also recommended, since it is already covered in the snapshot of the application.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </text>
